# 54. upgrade-zookeeper_3.7.1

**Date:** 2022-09-05

**Optional per env:** _required on all environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
Run command to upgrade Zookeeper version which 3.2.0 to 3.7.1

## Details
As part of our ongoing effort to keep CommCare HQ up to date with the latest tools and
libraries we have updated the Zookeeper version to use the zookeeper==3.7.1. 

## Steps to update

1. For users running Kafka on Linux machines:
   instructions: [zookeeper_upgrade](https://commcare-cloud.readthedocs.io/en/latest/services/zookeeper.html?highlight=zookeeper%20upgrade#upgrading-zookeeper)
